website_summaries.verdict: Deluxe ping-pong paddle that will help you play like a pro.
pros: Performance-level paddle designed to help you maximize speed and ball control
Comfortable grip can help you put extra spin on the ball at any time
More affordable than many similar paddles

customer_reviews.title: 99% sure Forest Gump would approve
customer_reviews.text: My dad and I play ping pong together on a weekly basis therefore we go through a set or two of paddles every year. That being said we always try to find reasonably priced paddles that still have good quality. These check all of the boxes. They aren't professional level or anything but we both feel we are able to control the ball, even getting some solid spins on the ball while we're at it. I want to add that my 4 and 6 year old nephews also use them and they survived.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: One of them was broken for just one month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it had a great deal for two of them with less than 20 bucks. From the beginning I received the items, they looked very well and the design is good for using. My kids used them to take their "PingPong" class and were getting used to it. However, only one month later, one of them was broken its handle for no reason. I tried to fix it but it is very difficult to do that, then I gave up. Hopefully this can improve their quality in future.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnHuo

customer_reviews.title: Great padding, cheap handle
customer_reviews.text: A handle of one of the paddles broke literally on the third time we used it, and we are not rough on our things. Have sent an email to them, so if the replace it and the new one does better, will update, but the handle on this one was clearly only glued in one small place and fell apart very easily. Gave it 3 stars because the padding on the paddle really is quite good and gives you a great amount of control and power. I've never been able to spin the ball as well as I can with these. Would love to give it 5 stars because of that, but unfortunately cannot due to the poor handle construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't deserve 4+ stars rating
customer_reviews.text: The kind of 4+ star reviews this one got, i utterly disappointed with it. First of all the packaging was bad. Due to that one side has permanent indentation of some other item which must have stayed on the top of it. Secondly the rebound or reflex ability is almost not there. I still need to apply swing force to move the ball enough. Also the doesn't stick on the surface enough so I can't spin it enough. It barely spin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting into ping pong was the best quarantine decision my wife and I made
customer_reviews.text: Buying a ping pong table and set of paddles was the best quarantine decision yet. My wife and I went from total beginners to obsessed table tennis competitors. If you’re in lockdown rn with another person, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations. Excellent Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. No exaggeration. I was shocked when I opened the package and felt the quality of these ping pong paddles for only 16 bucks. (The balls are okay/good). This product has truly exceeded my expectations. They also come in a really nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Springy, grippy. Best for offensive style players. Not good for up close.
customer_reviews.text: Very springy, grippy surface functions nicely without surface maintenance a year later with irregular use. I did, however, keep plastic protective sheets on them in the case between uses. Also, do yourself a favor and get some nice xushaofa balls like I did. I didn't get sponsored, I just like them. They are expensive, but it's so worth it. There's room in the case to keep 6 balls, I keep 3 cheap and 3 expensive with me at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...hoping they will last with a little TLC.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these cheap Chinese produced "Pro" rackets twice. For the money, they are pretty darn good. I am gauging to see if they last longer than my first set by cleaning them after each use. The first set I got, I never cleaned and they wore out fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: WH Smith

customer_reviews.title: You will like these
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle for the money. Not as good as $50,00 plus paddles but well worth the money. Far better than most recreational paddles. If you are not a serious tournament player you will be well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Edward Mattner

customer_reviews.title: Quality control sucks. Got a dented paddle
customer_reviews.text: Quality control was bad. One of the paddles had a big dent in it. With ping pong you would expect the paddle to Be in perfect shape but it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Stuntman

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are quality ping pong paddles / table tennis rackets - I’ve purchased much more expensive / higher end Stiga paddles/rackets & can barely tell a difference between the weight, spin or accuracy. Now, I’m far from a expert, but if you’re not highly competitive (ie- just a recreational player looking to have fun), then these paddles/rackets should fit your needs nicely at a relatively low cost.
customer_reviews.author: G'town

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: At fist when they arrived they seemed really nice. But after just a few weeks of use, the handles are separating and falling apart. Not well constructed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Already lost a piece of rubber from the paddle. I’m a ping pong novice so I read some reviews and purchased this paddle. The handle seems well made but a tad short for my small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S. Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Speed-99? More like Speed-55..
customer_reviews.text: I am an intermediate level player, and was very surprised to find a paddle with speed/spin/control of 99/100/80 at around 10$/paddle. I have used the 3 star TT balls by Kevenz (decent quality) and was hoping the paddles to be good too. But very disappointed with the product. Grippy surface, so good for spin, but low on power. Not sure if I would end up using them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Siddhesh Nagvekar

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a pro with these paddles! Spins are deadly with these!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Alma San Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy / Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice paddles. Well constructed and standing up to my 9 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer gelosa

customer_reviews.title: Completely fun.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been playing against a dining room wall while stuck inside. Very fun!! Well made set, nice wood feel, well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Joola mid size table, pro rackets and balls
customer_reviews.text: I reLly liked the paddles and most of all liked the action of the ping pong balls. These Joola balls had more control and action it seems over the regular white ones I’ve used. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Debi Harris

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: This set was good quality and we use it daily with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dk1589

customer_reviews.title: Awful racket and service
customer_reviews.text: It is a terrible racket and in the first week the covers came off in both sides. I asked for return but there is no return label for print in my portal. Very bad service for this item. wasted my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Aliakbar

customer_reviews.title: but I like a harder paddle
customer_reviews.text: These felt heavy to me, and the padding is so soft they don't have much feel for the ball. Haven't played with them a lot yet, but I like a harder paddle. Just personal preference I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Roperti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Light. Good rubbers. Sturdy. Great price. Only slight flaw, there is a rubber grip on the edge of the handle that prevents it from standing on the handle bottom. Very negligible. I would definitely recommend this and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Okay for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, not for intermediate or expert players. Okay for beginners. Balls are junk...
customer_reviews.author: Stay Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: feels great in my hand
customer_reviews.text: really solid and well made paddles. feels great in my hand. i'm a real novice when it comes to ping pong though, but it seems to play well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Ping pong paddles
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles and have lasted for a long time and also insanely great balls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time , has a really nice case. Paddles upped our game quite a bit because of the grip!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The ball jumps off these rackets. Very nice high quality. I’m very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Reed

customer_reviews.title: On time delivery and exact product detail
customer_reviews.text: The product was given to a friend outside the country. they have reported that it is precise and they are enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: olivia amosun

customer_reviews.title: These paddles seem to be good quality. They grip the ball well
customer_reviews.text: These paddles seem to be good quality. They grip the ball well, and have some good action. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the set of 2 for a coworker and myself. It's a little heavy compared to some of the other more expensive paddles out there but the weight doesn't bother us. The cushion is slightly stiff so the control is ok but spin and speed are definitely noticeable on the positive side. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good paddles
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good paddles, really good at gripping the ball which is really helpful for putting on spin. They are heavier than the average paddle though and so it’s easy to put a lot of force on the ball making it easy to hit really hard or to hit it off the table so you have to get used to that. I’ve had them and have been playing them consistently for about a month and see little to no wear or tear so they seem pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: John Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these have held up well to use and abuse from teenage boys. what else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Walkup

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for Typical Players
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly adequate ping pong paddles. Don't hesitate to buy for normal recreational purposes.
customer_reviews.author: GMW

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good price with the pair of rackets. They are durable and wonderful rackets, if you are a fan of ping-pong ball, but also have certain requirements on the racket, this racket will not be a bad choice. I like to use it with a red rubber side of the racket, which is very flexible. The king of batting feeling is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. It does smell like cement and needed to be air out.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: quality set
customer_reviews.text: Mine was came on time, very pleased with shipping service. The set is well made and excellent designed, well package.I'm an intermediates, i like this set compares to previous ones i've used. When hitting it, you can hear some smash like sound with this, give you a sense of offensive, which made games more fun. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice paddles for the price. Seems to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made, these will surely last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The top pilled off so i had to glue it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Fast delivery and exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathhenn

customer_reviews.title: These paddles were fantastic. We've gotten so much use out of them ...
customer_reviews.text: These paddles were fantastic. We've gotten so much use out of them and they're still holding strong. We are amateurs, so no clue how they compare to professional paddles. For the price, these were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Majid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. The holder it comes in too is quite nice!
customer_reviews.author: ruthfish75

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddles. Not as durable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddles. Not as durable as I expected. One of them cracked from hitting the table on a serve and both of them have rubber coming loose on the edges. Play is nice and I get a lot of spin.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love this product/ great gifts for table tennis players
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves table tennis and is usually pretty picky about tennis paddles, but he approves it. The product is excellent for it’s price and if I ever need paddles again, I would definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Below Average
customer_reviews.text: Too much padding. Too heavy. Very poor grip. Below average racket.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The price of this paddle is cheap, it really surprised me for it's performance. There are 2 paddles and 3 balls arrived together. I like use the red rubber on it which performed excellently at the smash and block the ball. We all had a good time with the new paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and grippy. I feel like a pro when I use these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not stick paddles together.
customer_reviews.text: work great, be careful paddles will stick together when new. after removing plastic I brushed paddle on my jeans to make less tacky.store paddles separate of each other. After that work great! nice weight.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: 3 Uses!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, look great, but one paddle broke in half the 3rd time it was used!
customer_reviews.author: melissa b

customer_reviews.title: certainly worth trying
customer_reviews.text: It arrived earlier than i expected. Purchase as a present for my grandson. He said played 5 games and he won them all. They came with 3 balls. Both the paddles and balls are very high quality, he is super happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Broke after few uses
customer_reviews.text: Both paddles broke within a few months of normal usage. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: P53

customer_reviews.title: These are some awesome paddles for this price
customer_reviews.text: These are some awesome paddles for this price. It really compares well with $100 paddles at a fraction of cost! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reza

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great ping pong paddle. This paddle is a great weight and comfortable to hold. The quality of the paddles were surprisingly great for the price.I love how it comes with 3 balls so you don't have to buy them as extra. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Better quality set
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a better quality set, I 'm glad I picked this one.They feel very good in the hand. They are solid racket and play well, I will pcik up a few more for my friends.We are really enjoy playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Hilario

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good paddles for the price! Slightly soft, sticky surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Leita Strei

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and recipient was very pleased. Looks great made quality. My friend says it is not heavy, enough space to hold and can get incredible spin. He is super satisfied with this present. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price - much better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price - much better than the cheap paddles for a few extra bucks. They hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm annihilating most people I play now. Step up homie! Step up!!
customer_reviews.author: Seanpresser

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: These ping pong paddles are the best paddles you will get for your money. I can hit a mean topspin with them!!!... The wood handles are so nice and smooth too. Best bank for your buck paddle. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Mcguire

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Solid set for casual players. The balls are decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amador Ollarzabal

customer_reviews.title: ... 100% Spin - 60% - 4 star balls gives better spin though
customer_reviews.text: Quality - 100% Rubber - 100% Speed - 100% Spin - 60% - 4 star balls gives better spin though. Weight - Little heavy for my hand
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: I do like it
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the quality. Good rubbers on the set with thick sponge, and the handle are easy and comfortable to hold at hand. I like the feel and of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Iakeicer

customer_reviews.title: both side are good feeling
customer_reviews.text: The paddle was given by my son. To be honest, at first i think it was the poor quality, but surprising, very durable and easy control, both side are good feeling, thanks
customer_reviews.author: h65s6hts

customer_reviews.title: Well made paddle
customer_reviews.text: Awesome paddle! Super fast, easy control and sticky surfase. They also fit in the hand nicely.. We all had a good time with our new bat.
customer_reviews.author: Alivoa

customer_reviews.title: Great rackets. I bought 2 sets and nothing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rackets. I bought 2 sets and nothing to complain about. For 7ply racket at 175-180gram they are light weight. Even my 6 and 8 year old can play forever. For the price and great quality you have to buy. Have those only for a week or so can't say anything how long they will last. But If you enjoy playing ping pong or want to introduce to your kids and friends please don't buy those chopping board quality rackets without foam better buy those for the same price. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Miro

customer_reviews.title: No balls were there
customer_reviews.text: Very upsetting... as no tennis balls were there in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Good bats. Decent rubber
customer_reviews.text: Good bats. Decent rubber. Can't complain for the price. Mine came with case and 3 (3 star) balls.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Welch

customer_reviews.title: No discernible difference from STIGA Pro Carbon, except price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought because a co-worker has a STIGA Pro Carbon, and playing against him is pretty pointless using original wood/sandpaper paddles. These are basically identical to the STIGA's, except much cheaper and you get 2 of them, plus 3 balls and a case. No brainer.
customer_reviews.author: cincyshirm61

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: These Table Tennis paddles are put together nicely and are of a decent weight - not too heavy for the kids or too light for adults - and they are comfortable when in play. Especially considering the price I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oterson

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The paddles and balls are the lowest quality, the balls are like the cheapo kids plastic ball..So do not buy things like this any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our table at home. They turn any table into a pool table!
customer_reviews.author: Amz

customer_reviews.title: Keep paddling!
customer_reviews.text: Pads stay firmly in place. The ball virtually jumps off the paddle! Improves my score!
customer_reviews.author: ERIC DENIAL

customer_reviews.title: They have wonderful spin and the speed is also fine
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving these paddles for home use. They have wonderful spin and the speed is also fine. It also shipped quite quickly for an international order. There is one case for both the paddles and that makes me worry for the health of the paddles while being stored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not professional but darn close
customer_reviews.text: Good weight, cant seem to get full spin, sticky but not spongy enough, 4 stars is being picky, great paddles for occasional players
customer_reviews.author: Jake Horn

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing. The amount of spin they have changed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. The amount of spin they have changed the way I play. And price can't be beat. Tip: Wipe down the rubber with dish soap solution to preserve the spin.
customer_reviews.author: Janamejay S.

product_meta.title: KEVENZ 2-Pack Patent Advanced Table Tennis Racket Come with Anti-Skid Handle, Wooden Blade Surrounded by Rubber
feature_bullets: 2-Pack Performance-Level Table Tennis Racket,3 Counts 3-Star Ping-Pong
Employ rubber to encircle the blade and handle, revolutionized your paddle to maximum control and speed
5-Ply Extra Light Blade, S5 Rubber, and 2mm Sponge
